It's Alive!

Apr 25, 2019

Hey, Ma! Look at What I made!

This site, is my first foray into... uh well, a few things really. Let's see:

  1. GitHub Pages for a user or organisation
  2. Installing and configuring Jekyll for blogging and static site building.
  3. Gitting it up with the two of the above to practice version control, branch maintenance for different purposes (master, feature-dev, drafts). I'm hoping that this structure will serve me well and let me practice some rebasing and other useful versioning flows.

This is also the first time that I've done anything worth pushing to the remote!

The next post will be an outline of the process that got me here so I can repeat it, if necessary, and make it automated in the future. I will simulpost on Medium as well.

Thanks for reading. Be good. Be kind. Peace.
